name: To Me, To Me, To Me
name_original: To Me, To Me, To Me
description:
How to play:

Fill the bottom slots with data-blocks you get by shooting the green creature heads.

Try to get this pattern: [ / ] [ -- ] [ \ ]

Move the data-blocks by holding [shift or M/R1] to copy your movement speeds to them. You can also quickly drop them with [control or B/L1]

Creating new data-blocks: Shoot at the green bouncy plant and collect the seed, your next shot will be a special shot that will change an empty creature head to a new green one.

Taking damage will corrupt the segment where you are. Taking damage in a corrupted segment will cause failure.

You can change the data-block's type by shooting it.

You can bounce off data-blocks and the seed plant.

Controls:

Jump: space / A button
Shoot: N / X button
Remote control data-block: shift or M / R1
Move data-block quickly down: Control or B / L1

Fullscreen: alt + enter
Mute music: H

Made in GameMaker2
With music by Antti Ylä-Rakkola
